content: This board is for the discussion of technology and related topics.  Reminder that instigating OR participating in flame/brand wars will result in a ban.Tech support threads should be posted to >>>/wsr/ Cryptocurrency discussion belongs on >>>/biz/  To use the Code tag, book-end your body of code with: [co­de] and [/co­de]  The /g/ Wiki: https://wiki.installgentoo.com/
What prevents me from buying Intel is that they pretty bad at maintaining their sockets.What did change lately?
>t. never used macs or linux(outside of wsl or servers)>never used iphones even when i received them as gifts, i just sell them or give them for free to family
>gets shilled often>decide to try it>a lot of abandoned packages>behind Neovim in development speed>literally used by less than 5% of developersNever fall for /g/ memes ever again
Why make life hard when the solution has always been here from the start?
I made a font so that people cant read my screen in public. Is this overkill?

Hiring freeze editionWorkplace stories. Advice on how to progress in your career. Ask and give help on HOW TO GET A JOB. Discuss the technologies you use.Making fun of NEETs is allowed and encouraged.Resources:https://leetcode.com/problemset/all/https://novoresume.com/career-blog/star-interview-questionshttps://blog.interviewing.io/https://codesubmit.io/blog/the-evolution-of-developer-salaries/

>>87001588Don't buy anything OTHER THAN IBM/Lenovo ThinkPad T, X, and W/P Series if you want the Real Business Experience™>Other business laptops are welcome in /tpg/ (Dell Latitude/Precision, HP EliteBook/ZBook)Why ThinkPad?>Used machines are plentiful and cheap>Excellent keyboards, tactile feel and quiet>Great durability: magnesium roll cage for structural integrity, with high quality plastic body panels>Utilitarian design: e.g. indicator LEDs, 7 row keyboard layout on older models>Docking stations that easily turns your laptop into a desktop>Easy to repair (most models), upgrade & maintain thanks to readily available service manuals for every model, spare parts easy & cheap to obtain>Excellent Linux & *BSD supportThinkWiki - General info about ThinkPads/specshttps://www.thinkwiki.org/wiki/ThinkWikiComment too long. Click here to view the full text.

Whats about TOR?Would be the best browser if some sites won't block it or choke the bandwidth on purpose.About the bandwidth /g/entoomen, is it me or Tor browser getting slower and slower? I can't really surf 4chan properly with it, all the threads and boards act like its 2002 dial up internet speed all over again and i didn't talk about video streaming sites...
Is Iceraven the best android browser? FOSS, It has firefox extensions, updates through FF updater
